channel.title: Strat's Projects on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Strat's Projects on Strat

item.title: Lynchman
item.description: Tool for generating Beat Saber maps from audio files automatically.

item.title: Framestore VR
item.description: VR subdivision within a special effects company focusing on developing high-end VR experiences.

item.title: Artifact Stat Tracker
item.description: Stat Tracking for Artifact, the competitive card game.

item.title: Machine Head
item.description: Discord (chat) bot running on a Raspberry Pi.

item.title: Pew Pew
item.description: Local competitive multiplayer game inspired by Asteroids.

item.title: Mages of Mystralia
item.description: Zelda-like action adventure game with an innovative spellcasting system on PC, PS4 and Xbox One.

item.title: Great Turtle Adventure IV
item.description: 3D racing game with my own custom game engine (DX10 and PhysX).

item.title: Black Box Bandit
item.description: Puzzle game with procedurally generated levels.

item.title: Invasion Logistics Pro
item.description: Arcade racing game with procedurally generated levels.

item.title: Battleships
item.description: Networked 2D top down turn-based strategy game inspired by the Battleships board game.

item.title: Graveyard Rush
item.description: 2D top down arcade shooter with online leaderboards.

item.title: Writerator
item.description: Random poetry generator using english language writing as reference data.

item.title: InfiniCube
item.description: SHMUP game without any shooting game.

item.title: DnD Sidekick
item.description: Windows Phone companion app for Pen and Paper roleplaying players.

item.title: DNA Toolkit
item.description: Windows Phone app for entering ACGT sequences and displaying the names of the entered sequences.
